transcript.text: shalam this is daniel john lee with tour
restoration ministries it is the weekly
Sabbath September the 13 2014 we are
less than two weeks away from yom teruah
the Feast of Trumpets first of the fall
feasts and I wanted to make a podcast
about recent events transpiring with the
US Syria and Russia it's very
interesting that it was exactly a year
ago this month that Obama was on the
verge of bombing Syria to remove the
Assad regime of course we all know what
happened Obama back down because Russia
in effect was threatening to start World
War three if the u.s. decided to attack
Assad they threatened to attack Saudi
Arabia and there was some backdoor
arm-twisting and diplomacy and then
Obama basically said that they had
reached out a diplomatic deal with
Russia to facilitate Assad getting rid
of his chemical weapons of course we
know that those chemical weapons really
never were removed still in Syria and of
course there's also questions about who
actually used the chemical weapons was
it Assad or was it the Syrian rebels
many of whom which now identify with
Isis so now here we are a year later and
once again Obama has authorized the use
of air strikes against Syria only this
time has he detailed in this speech on
September the 10th he intends to bomb
Syria to attack not the Assad regime but
Isis Isis militants within Syria now
Syria has been saying well if you want
to use air strikes against the Isis
militants in our country you need to get
our cooperation of course the United
States says no way we're not going to
cooperate with Assad we hate Assad we
hate his regime we're not going to
cooperate with him but Assad is saying
well you need to get our permission you
need to cooperate with us because they
fear that if the US starts
bombing Syria to destroy Isis that they
will also start bombing Assads
government and what's interesting is
that this article that I just found and
it's starting to pop up now on a bunch
of different news agencies within the
last 24 48 hours is that Russia is now
saying that because the u.s. is refusing
to seek the cooperation and permission
of the Syrian government to bomb Isis
targets within Syria Russia suspects
that the United States will also try to
use the bombing of Isis within Syria as
a pretext to bomb Assad regime and rush
is basically saying that they're very
angry about this and if the u.s. refuses
to get the cooperation and agreement and
permission of Damascus of the Assad
regime then they have no choice but to
believe that the United States is going
to use the bombing of Isis in Syria as a
pretext and a cover to also start
bombing Assad regime now the United
States may indeed start doing that
because that's what they wanted to do a
year ago but even if even if Obama and
the US military are not planning to do
that even if they're going to do
everything they can to avoid bombing
Assad regime and only strike Isis the
perception by both Russia and Damascus
is that that's not what they're going to
do so here we are now on the verge of
the fall feast once again a year later
and we're almost in the exact same
position we were in a year ago where the
United States is getting ready to bomb
Syria and Russia is very upset about it
of course Russia is very strong allies
with the Assad regime and with Syria so
it'll be interesting to see if what was
looking like it would transpire a year
ago is now actually going to unfold this
year and I heard something on satellite
radio news yesterday and I forget which
news anchor was but basically they said
that
you know the United States is going to
be working on doing reconnaissance
missions and trying to identify targets
within Syria but that within a month
over the next month they're planning to
start these air strikes on Syria and
that's very interesting because a month
from now would coincide with Sukkot the
Feast of Tabernacles which is probably
the most important and biggest feast of
the year and a very prophetic fall feast
as well so as the fall feasts are
approaching and as the US now is getting
ready to bomb Syria to take out Isis
targets within Syria and Russia saying
no you better not because we think
you're going to bomb a Syrian government
forces it'll be really interesting to
see what happens and how this all plays
out so I just wanted to highlight those
those things and I'm going to provide
some links the bottom of the video to
some of these articles that have just
recently come out about Russia being
very suspicious and very angry and very
upset about the u.s. wanting to bomb
Syria without seeking the permission or
cooperation of Assad regime this is
daniel john lee with poor restoration
ministries website is wwwspa- calm
shabbat shalom
